Package com.adobe.pdfservices.operation

Class PDFServicesJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.PDFServicesJob
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AutotagPDFJob, CombinePDFJob, CompressPDFJob, CreatePDFJob, DeletePagesJob, DocumentMergeJob, ExportPDFJob, ExportPDFToImagesJob, ExtractPDFJob, HTMLToPDFJob, InsertPagesPDFJob, LinearizePDFJob, OCRJob, PDFElectronicSealJob, PDFPropertiesJob, ProtectPDFJob, RemoveProtectionJob, ReorderPagesPDFJob, ReplacePagesPDFJob, RotatePagesJob, SplitPDFJob
    public abstract class PDFServicesJob
extends Object
    This abstract class represents the basic contract for all the PDF Services Jobs. It imposes no restrictions or particular details on the job execution process and leaves the specifics of setting up the jobs to their individual implementations.
